meanings.definition: A shrub of the honeysuckle family, with funnel-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The weigela in our garden has beautiful pink flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted a weigela bush near the fence for its lovely blooms.
meanings.sent3: The weigela in the yard waved its flowery arms in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a canvas, with the weigela as the artist's brush.
meanings.sent5: The weigela's flowers were like tiny trumpets announcing spring's arrival.

meanings.definition: The genus of shrubs to which the Weigela belongs.
meanings.sent1: The weigela genus includes many different species of shrubs.
meanings.sent2: We learned about the weigela genus in our botany class.
meanings.sent3: The weigela genus seemed to have a family reunion in the garden.
meanings.sent4: In the world of shrubs, the weigela genus reigns supreme.
meanings.sent5: Each member of the weigela genus brings its unique charm to the landscape.
